title: sysoe
author: sysoe
content: Other than investing in BTC, a happy wife is a happy life, which is so fn true   how bout you?

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well when I was only a little boy my father left me to be alone with my mother. But I will always remember this one piece of advice he told me. It has stayed with me to this day. He told me to not let any one walk all over me. Not to let any one take advantage of me. It was for him to say I need to be a man at such a young age. And I needed to take this advice to help care for me mother when he left one night out and did not return.

comments.author: Ozymon
comments.body: Quote from: sysoe on July 13, 2023, 07:12:39 AMOther than investing in BTC, a happy wife is a happy life, which is so fn true   how bout you?I haven't married yet, but yeah I heard that a lot. I think we as a man have to develop a skill of "white lie", isn't it? hahaJokes aside, one advice that always stick to my mind is "You have to have to be precious". She was my lecturer. Moreover she explained that we have to be precious to be confident enough living this life. I'm still trying to make it happen tho, wish me luck.

comments.author: Joyce ukata
comments.body: When I was growing up, my grandmother always told me, "Never give up on your endeavors." This advice has been incredibly valuable throughout my life's journey. It keeps resonating in my memory because it has helped me stay determined and keep pushing forward. To me, it is the best advice I have ever received.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: My parents and other told me to never stop believing in Jesus for everlasting life in Heaven.

comments.author: Marketer03
comments.body: The best advise I've ever heard is that internal peace of mind is more important than exterior success. It's common for "successful" people to be depressed on the inside. Ignore this trap. Inner peace cannot be attained by accomplishment. Acquire the ability to be at peace with yourself, regardless of your possessions or the opinions of others.

comments.body: Absolutely, man! Keeping the happiness flowing, both in investments and at home. It's all about that balance, you know?

comments.body: My favorite advice or quote is "Ego is the enemy. The obstacle is the way." Our ego can be our biggest obstacle, and overcoming that and getting your hands dirty is the path to success and fulfillment.

comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on August 28, 2023, 04:01:06 PMMy parents and other told me to never stop believing in Jesus for everlasting life in Heaven.I'd agree on you with this one. It's like doing my best and let Him do the rest of it. So, if it's the best of advice, that's it. comments.author: MissNonFall9
comments.body: Five years ago today, I was very sick, apart from physical illness, I also suffered from mental illness. Because at that time I was unemployed, I did a lot of studies but I was not getting good results in anything. Then I decided to get a consultation from a medical specialist. The doctor checked my blood pressure there he saw high blood pressure through ECG he said that my heart beat rate was very high. When he heard all the incidents he looked at me with bloodshot eyes and said in a very hoarse voice that you have a mental problem and you should see a psychiatrist. Your solution to this problem lies within you only your mind calms your mind and thinks everything is fine everything is fine you move on from here what has happened can never be recovered.
